quotes.quote: That's the strange thing about being a mother: Until you have a baby, you don't even realize how much you're missing one.
Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.
Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
Making the decision to have a child it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
I understood once I held a baby in my arms, why some people have the need to keep having them.
Having a baby changes the way you view your in-laws. I love it when they come to visit now. They can hold the baby and I can go out.
Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever-fresh and radiant possibility.
A new baby is like the beginning of all things wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
Children reinvent your world for you.
A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years and in your heart till the day you die.
It was the tiniest thing I ever decided to put my whole life into.
You never understand life until it grows inside of you.
A perfect example of minority rule is a baby in the house.
Having a child is wondrous. It is to forever have your heart go walking around outside your body.
Having children makes you no more a parent than having a piano makes you a pianist.
Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit.
Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
When you have a baby, love is automatic, when you get married, love is earned.
A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
Having a baby is like taking your lower lip and forcing it over your head.
The joy of having a baby today can only be expressed in two words: tax deduction.
I loved having my baby inside of me, but I was very happy when he was finally here.
Having children is like living in a frat house - nobody sleeps, everything's broken, and there's a lot of throwing up.
One thing I had learned from watching chimpanzees with their infants is that having a child should be fun.
Now the thing about having a baby - and I can't be the first person to have noticed this - is that thereafter you have it.
Babies are always more trouble than you thought- and more wonderful.
It kills you to see them grow up. But I guess it would kill you quicker if they didn't.
Having a baby takes so much from you. It's the most glorious thing you'll ever do, but the aftermath is not so glorious!
Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
I do not believe having a baby is punishment.
Having a baby's sweet face so close to your own, for so long a time as it takes to nurse 'em, is a great tonic for a sad soul.
Having a crying baby is inspiration to get the job done quickly.
Having a baby is like suddenly getting the world's worst roommate.
Having babies is a blessing, not a duty.
Having a baby is painful in order to show how serious a thing life is.
Having a baby is like getting a tattoo on your face. You really need to be certain it's what you want before you commit.

One thing about having a baby is that each step of the way you simply cannot imagine loving him any more than you already do, because you are bursting with love, loving as much as you are humanly capable of- and then you do, you love him even more.
Having a baby is part of a woman's life, and it is surely a great waste to be afraid of life.
If men had to have babies, they would only ever have one each.
I think it is such a privilege to give a baby its first home inside your body.
Carrying a baby is the most rewarding experience a woman can enjoy.
The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
There is no finer investment for any community than putting milk into babies.
You never understand life until it grows inside of you.
Having my baby fall asleep in my arms takes away all of my worries and stresses. A sense of complete and total peace comes over me.
A baby changes your dinner party conversation from politics to poops.
It's extraordinary to look into a baby's face and see a piece of your flesh and your spirit. It makes you realize you are a part of the human race.
I knew it was going to be the most extraordinary thing in my life, but how powerful it is, you can never know until you have a baby.
A man is not complete until he has seen the baby he has made.
People who say they sleep like a baby usually don't have one.
Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
